pullRequest.title: Maintenance windows u1
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?

extract createActionForServerAt() into an TestUtils class
implement a XMLRPC Handler test which also test the serializer for RescheduleResults
fix RescheduleResult system list to contain only systemids
do not allow to change unique identifier for schedule and calendar
handle download exceptions in a better way

GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

Documentation


No documentation needed: internal


 DONE


Test coverage


Unit tests were added


 DONE


Links
Fixes SUSE/spacewalk#11274

 DONE

Changelogs
If you don't need a changelog check, please mark this checkbox:

 No changelog needed

If you uncheck the checkbox after the PR is created, you will need to re-run changelog_test (see below)
Re-run a test
If you need to re-run a test, please mark the related checkbox, it will be unchecked automatically once it has re-run:

 Re-run test "changelog_test"
 Re-run test "backend_unittests_pgsql"
 Re-run test "java_lint_checkstyle"
 Re-run test "java_pgsql_tests"
 Re-run test "ruby_rubocop"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_oracle"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_pgsql"
 Re-run test "susemanager_unittests"
 Re-run test "javascript_lint"
 Re-run test "spacecmd_unittests"

commit.message: fixup! Handle reschedule case "Fail" and return detailed reschedule informations
fixup! extract createActionForServerAt into utils class
fixup! unit test: test action chains

afterCommit.message: fixup! unit test: test action chains

beforeCommit.message: throw new DownloadFaultException when calendar download failed

afterCommit.message: throw new DownloadFaultException when calendar download failed

nodes.bodyText: Could you either delete this line, or create an assertion, that the depending actions are in fact not in the result?
Nit: 1060-1099 belongs to "System exceptions", maybe "Action exceptions", "Misc exceptions" or "SUSE exceptions" would be more suitable.

+
+    /**
+     * Constructor
+     *
+     * @param d exception
+     */
+    public DownloadFaultException(Throwable d) {
+        super(1074, "downloadError", "Download failed", d);

commit.message: fixup! unit test: test action chains
remove calendar needs possibility to cancel affected actions
Use special method for maintenance window check

forbid to change the unique identifier

we could not verify that this cause problems, but we have a bad feeling
about it so we better forbid it
throw new DownloadFaultException when calendar download failed
fix unit test: non-deterministic order at remove schedules solved

beforeCommit.message: fixup! fixup! unit test: test action chains

afterCommit.message: fix unit test: non-deterministic order at remove schedules solved

commit.message: Allow to remove a calender from a schedule
Mock taskomatic called for scheduling actions in unit tests
